get.description: This API lists the contacts associated with a product.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Key that fetches secondary information related to the contact.Value allowed is @accounts@

schema.description: Key that fetches secondary information related to the contact.Value allowed is @accounts@

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Parameter that sorts contacts by one of these attributes: !@firstName,@! !@lastName,@! !@phone,@! !@email,@! !@account,@! !@createdTime,@! !@modifiedTime@!

schema.description: Parameter that sorts contacts by one of these attributes: !@firstName,@! !@lastName,@! !@phone,@! !@email,@! !@account,@! !@createdTime,@! !@modifiedTime@!

post.summary: Invite multiple contacts to help center
post.description: This API helps invite multiple contacts as end-users to your help center.

delete.description: This API deletes the display picture of a contact.

get.description: This API fetches the overall statistics of an contact.

parameters.name: department
parameters.description: _This Param is being deprecated please use the departmentId param to fetch the department specific statistics_

schema.description: _This Param is being deprecated please use the departmentId param to fetch the department specific statistics_

parameters.name: timeRange
parameters.description: Key that filters statistics observed in a specific date and time range. Enter the from and to dates in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ; for example, timeRange=2017-11-05T00:00:00.000Z,2018-02-05T23:59:00.000Z. The maximum period allowed for the time range is six months.

schema.description: Key that filters statistics observed in a specific date and time range. Enter the from and to dates in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ; for example, timeRange=2017-11-05T00:00:00.000Z,2018-02-05T23:59:00.000Z. The maximum period allowed for the time range is six months.

post.description: This API dissociates multiple accounts from a particular contact.
This API moves the contacts specified to the Recycle Bin.

patch.description: This API dissociates a particular account from a contact.

get.summary: Get status of contact in help centers
get.description: This API fetches a particular contact'sÂ activation status in all the help centers they are part of.
This API fetches the ticket history of a contact.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: Key that filters ticket activities performed by a particular agent

schema.description: Key that filters ticket activities performed by a particular agent

parameters.name: departmentId
parameters.description: ID of the department from which the history details must be fetched

schema.description: ID of the department from which the history details must be fetched

get.description: This API lists a particular number of contacts, based on the limit specified.

post.description: This API creates a contact in your help desk portal.
This API updates multiple contacts at once.

get.description: This API displays the count for the number of contacts in a custom view
This API lists details of specific contacts, based on the IDs passed in the request.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: List of Contact Ids (separated by comma) which must be fetched. The maximum number of IDs allowed is 20.

schema.description: List of Contact Ids (separated by comma) which must be fetched. The maximum number of IDs allowed is 20.

x-custom-parameters-attributes: List of Contact Ids (separated by comma) which must be fetched. The maximum number of IDs allowed is 20.

get.description: This API fetches a single contact from your help desk portal.

patch.description: This API updates details of an existing contact.

post.description:
This API merges two or more contacts

_Note:_
Though portal users (users who signed up via the help center) are saved as contacts in the help desk, their records cannot be merged with other records/contacts.
This API helps approve a particular contact as an end-user to your help center.
This API helps reject a particular contact from being added as an end-user to your help center.
This API associates multiple accounts with a particular contact.
This API associates products with a contact. Only a maximum of 10 products can be associated with a contact through a single API request.
This API marks contacts as spam.
This API deletes the given spam contacts
This API helps invite a particular contact as an end-user to your help center.

get.description: This API lists the contacts associated with an account

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Parameter that sorts contacts by one of these attributes: !@firstName,@! !@lastName,@! !@fullName,@! !@phone,@! !@email,@! !@createdTime,@! !@modifiedTime@!

schema.description: Parameter that sorts contacts by one of these attributes: !@firstName,@! !@lastName,@! !@fullName,@! !@phone,@! !@email,@! !@createdTime,@! !@modifiedTime@!

post.description: This API simultaneously adds multiple contacts to your help desk portal.

accountId.description: Account to which the contact is mapped

secondaryEmail.description: Secondary email ID of the contact

ownerId.description: ID of the user who creates the contact

secondaryEmail.descrption: Secondary email ID of the contact

ownerId.descrption: ID of the user who creates the contact

photoURL.descrption: URL of the file containing the image of the contact

isDeleted.descrption: Key that returns if the contact is deleted or not

isTrashed.descrption: Field that denotes whether the contact is in trash

type.descrption: Contact type in Zoho CRM. Values supported are new, @potentials@, @customers@, @contacts@, and @leads@.

id.descrption: ID of the contact in Zoho CRM

badPercentage.descrption: Percentage of negative ratings given by the contact

okPercentage.descrption: Percentage of ok ratings given by the contact

goodPercentage.descrption: Percentage of positive ratings given by the contact

accountId.descrption: Account to which the contact is mapped

isSpam.descrption: Field that denotes whether the contact is spam

isTrashed.descrption: Field that denotes whether the contact is in trash

type.descrption: Contact type in Zoho CRM. Values supported are new, @potentials@, @customers@, @contacts@, and @leads@.

id.descrption: ID of the contact in Zoho CRM

badPercentage.descrption: Percentage of negative ratings given by the contact

okPercentage.descrption: Percentage of ok ratings given by the contact

goodPercentage.descrption: Percentage of positive ratings given by the contact

accountId.descrption: Account to which the contact is mapped

from.name: from
from.description: Index number, starting from which the contacts must be listed

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the contacts must be listed

ids.description: ID(s) of the contact(s) that must be marked or unmarked as spam

isSpam.description: Key that marks or unmarks a single contact or multiple contacts as spam

handleExistingTickets.description: Key that marks or unmarks tickets from the contact(s) as spam
